sentences.en: " Hole onter sumpin'an'suck in yo'breaf,'she commanded.
sentences.cn: " 给我紧紧抓住个什么,使劲儿往里吸气, " 她命令道.

sentences.en: a baby sucking at its mother’s breast
sentences.cn: 一个在吸吮母乳的婴儿

sentences.en: Bees suck honey from flowers.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂从花中吸吮蜜汁.

sentences.en: Don’t suck your thumb, dear.
sentences.cn: 不要吮大拇指，宝贝。

sentences.en: Good writers suck in what they see of the world, re-creating their own universe on the page.
sentences.cn: 优秀的作家从他们眼中的世界汲取体验，然后在纸上重塑自己的天地。

sentences.en: He can suck up as much information as you can give him.
sentences.cn: 你教他多少,他就可以学多少.

sentences.en: he has risen to where he is mainly by &B{sucking up to} the president.
sentences.cn: 他主要靠巴结奉承主席才升到现在的职位。

sentences.en: He is always telling the director how to run the business; that's like teaching one's grandmother how to suck eggs.
sentences.cn: 他经常告诉主任如何经营, 这岂不是班门弄斧吗?

sentences.en: It's good to suck in such clean fresh air for a change.
sentences.cn: 换个环境,吸点清新空气,真是好极了.

sentences.en: Life is all moon shine, a monstrous humbug, a grand suck - in.
sentences.cn: 生活全是假象, 是可怕的欺诈, 是一场吸引人上当的大骗局.

sentences.en: Michael put the cigarette to his lips and sucked in the smoke.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔把香烟放到唇边吸了一口。

sentences.en: Peter heard him suck in breath through his teeth.
sentences.cn: 彼得听到他从牙缝中倒抽一口冷气.

sentences.en: She suck back the juice that was trying to escape.
sentences.cn: 她吮吸了快要流下来的汁水.

sentences.en: She suck up to him by agree with everything he say.
sentences.cn: 她巴结他,他说什么话她都同意.

sentences.en: Suck on the tube to draw up the water.
sentences.cn: 用管子把水吸上来.

sentences.en: The worms have perforated the mucosa to suck blood.
sentences.cn: 虫体钻入粘膜吸血.

sentences.en: Then the pumps suck them up into the boats.
sentences.cn: 然后唧筒把他们吸到船上.

sentences.en: They suck you in to their seedy world.
sentences.cn: 他们把你卷入他们肮脏糜烂的圈子里。

sentences.en: They waited in silence and sucked their sweets.
sentences.cn: 他们静静地等着，吮着糖果。

sentences.en: to suck the juice from an orange
sentences.cn: 吸橙子的汁

words.tran_cn: 吸奶的；授乳的；尚未断奶的；乳臭未干的
[生物] 吸吮的；有吸盘的；吸附的

phrases.tran_cn: 耗尽某人的体力（物力或感情）
(非正式)（尤指为了自己的利益）巴结，奉承

trans.tran_en: to take air, liquid etc into your mouth by making your lips form a small hole and using the muscles of your mouth to pull it in
to take air, liquid etc into your mouth by making your lips form a small hole and using the muscles of your mouth to pull it in
to hold something in your mouth and pull on it with your tongue and lips
